name: Custom meta description
description: Replaces the theme provided description by a configurable, context aware, custom one. Enables you to e.g. use the album title as description. Supports lens variable.

albums.label: Albums
albums.info: Album list configuration. You can combine lens syntax and static text.  E.g. 'My Album: {{ album.title }}. Leave empty if you want to use the default description provided by the theme. Hint: Depending on you theme, this might be your root page.'

album.label: Album
